alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 10:51AM EDT until August 08 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, North Woods, and Penobscot Valley Maine, including the following areas, Piscataquis, Northern and Central Penobscot and Southeast Aroostook. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple round of showers and storms will move into the area this morning and continue through the evening hours. Enhanced lift over the higher terrain will likely result in higher rainfall totals. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis
